description: This tables stores the MEA test-related information.

columns.name: TX_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the transaction record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line count for the item.  This represents a single charge procedure on the transaction record.

columns.name: MEA_TEST_C_NAME
columns.description:
The measurement qualifier category ID for Mouse Embryo Assay (MEA) test associated to the transaction.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Concentration


Gas Test Rate


Height


Hemoglobin


Hematocrit


Epoetin Starting Dosage


Creatinine


Oxygen


Last Kt/V Result

columns.name: MEA_DATE
columns.description: The date on which the measurement is taken.
